Who: CYCLONUS, SCOURGE, Hydras, Perceptor, Kup, Tuscon Prime, Nightshift
Location: Black Fortress - Security Holding Cells

(OOC: Sandy, I hope you don't mind me pushing this section along a
bit. If you want to back up and RP, make any changes or additions,
please let me know. I have made it look grim, hope you guys are
satisfied with it)

BIC:

> Hydras hissed "Separate the bots named Kup and Nightshift, I want them in
> the high security cells and also I like that they dont know where is the
> other one... Set the Scanners in order to have a check out every 5 cicles"
> and looking to Tucson said "And our special Guest will have The Pit..."

As Hydras gave orders, Cyclonus entered the different commands into
the system. Some doors closed while others opened allowing Hydras
access to the 'PIT' as he described it. In addition to being small and
confined, like a real pit it was positioned below the main cell block
section.

As Hydras approached, one could not help but notice the cannons that
were oriented along the way along with security cameras. Occasionally
a purple strobe light would flash along the hall as if scanning it for
intruders.

When Hydras approached the 'PIT' with Tuscon in tow, the door to it
opened, allowing heat and steam to hiss as they escaped the room.

The interior of the room itself was approximately the size of a cargo
pod - just large enough enough to hold a single transformer, and even
then only manacled. The tempature of the room could only be called
hot! A human, should he or she have the unfortunate circumstance to
arrive here, would quickly be overcome by the heat.

The walls of the room were cut from a mixture of stone and galvanized
Cybertronian metals, they were solid and thick, seemingly designed for
brute strength and durability. The manacles that were positioned along
the wall were also thick and cut apparently from the same type of
metal as the walls. They were attached directly to the walls and
allowed very little if any movement, depending on the mercy of the one
administering the punishment.

Only a single machine was positioned in this chamber, presumably to
provide the energy requirements for transformers. (OOC: Transformers
food and drink). This machine also provided the only illumination for
the room, and also like the lights in the chambers above, the machine
was recessed into the walls and protected by a transparent material
unless it was feeding time.

At the moment the illumination from the machine was bright, but it
would dim as the door closed or if commanded by Hydras or some other
duly appointed security officer.

> Then he send a private messages to Cyclonus" Cyclonus, go to
> the throne Room and take the lady with you... Be glente, she's one of us, I
> want that you keep an eye in her while Perceptor is busy here... If
> something happens her, you will pay for that, understood?"

Cyclonus, who had been observing the progress of each one from the
main security section nodded as he got the message from Hydras. "Of
course." he said calmly. "Each prisoner has been put in their cells as
per your orders, and the doors closed and sealed. When you are done
with Tuscon, his door will be sealed as well."

Cyclonus checked a few controls as he sent Rodimus a few orders,
meanwhile he continued his radio communication with Hydras, "I will
have Rodimus to take over here while I take care of our guest." he
said, talking about Nightlight. "Rodimus will be able to observe
Tuscon as well as any of the other Autobots and monitor them to ensure
that no one will be able to escape."

(OOC: Of course that monitoring will allow Tuscon and Rodimus to have
a conversation as well. heh heh)

TAG

Preston
